New Records: G. Cole pitched 7.0 innings with 6 hits, 1 ER, and 4 K for the Yankees.
M. Wacha pitched 4.2 innings with 6 hits, 2 ER, and 2 K for the Royals.
Key Match Events: Yankees scored in the 1st and 5th innings.
Stanton hit a single to score Judge in the 6th inning.
Pasquantino doubled to score Witt Jr. in the 6th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game was played at Kauffman Stadium with 39,012 attendees.
Umpires included Mark Carlson, Lance Barksdale, Roberto Ortiz, Adam Hamari, Ryan Blakney, and Lance Barrett.
Others: Game was covered by TBS, TruTV, and Max.
